Drop N GrowAll-In-One Container Solution

The Drop N Grow system offers a revolutionary all-in-one container solution designed to streamline your growing operations. Built with a streamlined, efficient setup into the cultivation industry, it offers a traditional grow medium. Every container provides the tools to maximize your growing potential.

Drop N Grow vs Traditional Facilities

Design Time

Drop N Grow
Minimal; pre-designed shipping container
Traditional Facility
Extensive; requires architectural and engineering plans

Cost

Drop N Grow
Set costs that are often cheaper than whole building facilities for similar amount of lights
Traditional Facility
Hidden fees and dishonest middlemen overcharging

Revenue per Labor Hour

Drop N Grow
Higher due to automation and reduced labor needs
Traditional Facility
Lower; manual processes require more labor and management

Setup Time

Drop N Grow
Rapid installation; simple hookups (water, electric, internet)
Traditional Facility
Lengthy construction time; complex infrastructure needed

Architectural Involvement

Drop N Grow
None required; pre-built solution
Traditional Facility
Extensive architectural planning required

Compliance

Drop N Grow
EUGACP compliant from the start with included SOPs
Traditional Facility
Compliance requires custom solutions and documentation

Modular Buildouts

Drop N Grow
Scalable from 1 to 40+ containers as your business expands
Traditional Facility
Not modular; must plan for future expansion from the start

Mobility

Drop N Grow
ISO compliant container for easy relocation
Traditional Facility
Fixed location; difficult and costly to relocate

Key Features

Advanced Irrigation

Built-in irrigation system for optimal water distribution and nutrient delivery.

  • Automated watering
  • Precision drip system
  • Water-efficient design

Smart Monitoring

Integrated sensors and control system for complete environmental management.

  • Real-time monitoring
  • Mobile app control
  • Data analytics

Professional Design

Engineered for commercial growing operations with durability and efficiency in mind.

  • UV resistant materials
  • Stackable design
  • Easy maintenance

Technical Specifications

Physical Specifications

Height:24 inches
Width:18 inches
Depth:18 inches
Capacity:5 gallons

System Requirements

Power Supply:110V/220V
Water Connection:Standard 3/4"
Network:WiFi enabled
Control Interface:Touch screen

Control System - CRONOS

Our integrated control system provides seamless control over:

  • Nutrient dosing and monitoring
  • Environmental controls
  • Lighting schedules
  • Data logging and analytics
